sense.name: a person authorized to represent another, a stand_in
sense.examples: John will be a proxy for several shareholders at the next meeting. I designated Mary as my proxy at the homeowners meeting last fall.

sense.name: a document authorizing another to vote on one's behalf
sense.examples: The proxies must be sent in by Friday in order to be valid. Sally explained the wording on the proxy to her mother.

sense.name: having power-of-attorney to do something
sense.examples: These voters will register by proxy. Mary voted by proxy at her condominium because she was out of town then.

sense.name: a quantity that is a stand_in value for another value
sense.examples: The study used a U.S. measure of wealth as a proxy for a worldwide measure of it.
